description: The fugitive is reportedly heavily armed, with stolen police pistols and a bow and arrows.
title: Yves Rausch: German police hunt 'dangerous Rambo' in Black Forest
title_page: Yves Rausch: German police hunt 'dangerous Rambo' in Black Forest - BBC News
maintext: Earlier a police spokesman said the suspect had appeared co-operative on Sunday, after police tracked him down, but then "suddenly he pulled out his pistol and aimed at the officers".
